title: Publications
text:

Godoy, L. da C., Prates, M. O., & Yan, J. (2022). An unified framework for point-level, areal, and mixed spatial data: The hausdorff-gaussian process. arXiv. https://doi.org/10.48550/ARXIV.2208.07900

title: Statistical Data Science Lab
text:
Hello there, I’m Lucas, a Ph.D. candidate studying Statistics at the UConn Department. My research interests primarily revolve around statistical computing, Bayesian inference, spatial statistics, and exploring innovative applications of statistical methodologies. Apart from that, I enjoy learning about programming languages and emerging technologies.
If you browse through this website, you’ll find some of my blog posts, mainly discussing R or statistical concepts, as well as my CV, publications, and ongoing projects.
